comment: Hey there, derogatory comments are not productive. Please refrain from using them and consider other peoples feelings when posting. Thanks
amr:
# ::snt Hey there, derogatory comments are not productive. Please refrain from using them and consider other peoples feelings when posting. Thanks
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / say-01
            :ARG1 (p / productive-03
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (c / comment-01
                        :mod (d / derogatory))
                  :mod (h / hey
                        :mode expressive))
            :ARG2 (t / there))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (r / refrain-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (u / use-01
                        :ARG0 y
                        :ARG1 (t2 / they)))
            :op2 (c2 / consider-02
                  :mode imperative
                  :polite +
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (f / feel-01

                              :mod (o / other)))
                  :time (p3 / post-01
                        :ARG0 y)))
      :snt3 (t3 / thank-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 y))
